Package fr.maxlego08.itemstacker.api

Interface StackedItem

public interface StackedItem

  • Method Details

    • toBukkitEntity

      org.bukkit.entity.Item toBukkitEntity()
      Returns:
      the bukkit entity representing this item

    • getUniqueId

      UUID getUniqueId()
      Returns the unique identifier for this item.
      Returns:
      the unique id

    • getAmount

      int getAmount()
      Gets the amount of this item.
      Returns:
      the amount

    • setAmount

      void setAmount(int amount)
      Sets the amount of this item. This value is NOT saved anywhere, you are responsible for saving it. Note that setting the amount to 0 will remove the item from the world.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to set

    • isSimilar

      boolean isSimilar(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
      Compares this StackedItem with the provided ItemStack to determine if they are similar. The similarity is defined by the specific implementation of this method.
      Parameters:
      itemStack - The ItemStack to compare against this StackedItem.
      Returns:
      true if the provided ItemStack is considered similar to this StackedItem, false otherwise.

    • setItemName

      void setItemName()
      Sets the name of the item. This method is used to define the name of the item as it appears to players. The name is not used in any way by the plugin, it is only used for aesthetics.

    • add

      void add(int amount)
      Increases the amount of this item by the provided amount. This method will do nothing if the amount is 0 or negative.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to increase the item amount by

    • remove

      void remove(int amount)
      Decreases the amount of this item by the specified amount. If the resulting amount is less than or equal to zero, the item will be removed from the world.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to decrease the item amount by

    • isValid

      boolean isValid()
      Checks if this StackedItem is valid. A StackedItem is considered valid if it has a positive amount and has not expired.
      Returns:
      true if the StackedItem is valid, false otherwise

    • give

      boolean give(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
      Tries to give this StackedItem to the provided inventory. If the inventory has enough space, the item will be added to the inventory and this method will return true. If the inventory does not have enough space, this method will return false.
      Parameters:
      inventory - the inventory to give the item to
      Returns:
      true if the item was given, false otherwise

    • getCreatedAt

      long getCreatedAt()
      Gets the time (in milliseconds) at which the item was created.
      Returns:
      the time at which the item was created

    • getExpireAt

      long getExpireAt()
      Gets the time (in milliseconds) at which the item will expire. If the item never expires, this method will return 0.
      Returns:
      the time at which the item will expire, or 0 if the item never expires

    • remove

      void remove()
      Removes this StackedItem from the world. If the item is in an inventory, it will be removed from the inventory. If the item is on the ground, it will be removed from the ground.

    • getItemStack

      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getItemStack()
      Gets the ItemStack object associated with this StackedItem. This method will never return null.
      Returns:
      the ItemStack object associated with this StackedItem
